WorkItem.Description:
Now that most of the major SVG viewers support some filters bringing SVG closer to this level of functionality would be beneficial.
Â 
There are many filters but the most common appears to be gaussian blur (note that there are several filters involved in using a blur for a shadow so this implementation would have to include those).
WorkItem.Summary: Support basic filter effects such as gaussian blur.

Comments.Message: There you go - voted.   No, no deadline.  I've looked at the older .NET SVG implementations in the past and the SVG2XAML utilities and non do true SVG support.  Maybe it will be you that makes the break through.
